document_data.name: Oulam
document_data.mainbody: '''Oulam''' was a [[necromancer]] that lived in the [[Baldur's Gate]] region of the [[Sword Coast]] for a time during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possesions: He wore a ''[[robe of electrical resistnace]]'', and carried with him a handful ''[[dart of stunning|darts of stunning]]''.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Oulam joined with the [[Zhentarim]] agent [[Niemain]], along with two other mages, [[Wheber Ott]] and [[Willaim Garst]], to cast an especially difficult spell on the second floor of [[Sorcerous Sundries]] in Baldur's Gate.
